page.title: 06Religion & Life, Freshfield
page.content: {RELIGION}Of 202 people interviewed at Freshfield, 153 said that they had religious beliefs whereas 49 people hadn't. 52 people went to church once a week, 16 people went about once a month and 37 people went less often. The most common reason given for not going was not having the time. The most interesting reason was given by a man who said that you only go to church to confess sins and he'd never done anything wrong! {SOCIAL EVENTS}The golf,tennis,squash and cricket clubs hold barbecues, wine tasting, dances etc..Members are mainly local people. {WOMAN'S FASHION AND HAIR}Many older woman have short curls like the Queen's. Many young women imitate Princess Diana's short wavy hair. Many teenagers wear short 'miniskirts'. Children often prefer bright colours.
